snippet: The net worth increase was attributed to higher stock prices and the housing recovery.
abstract: Federal Reserve says household net worth in United States rose 2.6 percent, to $77.3 trillion, from July through September.
lead_paragraph: The net worth increase was attributed to higher stock prices and the housing recovery.

headline.main: U.S. Household Net Worth Rose 2.6% in 3rd Quarter
headline.print_headline: U.S. Household Net Worth Rose 2.6% in 3rd Quarter
